metadata.name: On The Tracks
metadata.description:
About "On The Tracks"  
Tram Tracks are a place I would often wait for people to cross or on a daring day, a tram approaching in the distance. Here, in a slightly foggy day, I found the perfect person at just the right moment with a tram not far behind him. Two for one if you will!

In my Exposed In The Light collection, I speak of learning to cope with my surroundings and to come to terms with the feelings of isolation and anxiety I experienced after moving from the US. My camera became a way for me to analyze my surroundings and connect in a creative way. Each frame in the collection is a moment that I learned from but also a projection of myself and these feelings. 

This work is an accompaniment to this collection.
